Can you make the relevant changes to pass down the logger to this function

@backoff.on_exception(
    backoff.expo,
    Exception,
    max_tries=8,
)
async def generate_response_from_gpt4_with_messages(
    messages: List[Any],
    logger: logging.LoggerAdapter,
) -> str:
    response = await openai.ChatCompletion.acreate(
        # We are using gpt-4 cause its faster than gpt4 (altho more expensive)
        model="gpt-4-32k",
        max_tokens=12000,
        messages=messages,
        temperature=0.1,
    )
    return response["choices"][0]["message"]["content"]

async def what_code_snippets_to_lookup(prompt: str) -> str:
    response = await generate_response_from_gpt4_with_messages(
        messages=[
            {"role": "system", "content": get_system_prompt_for_tool_usage()},
            {"role": "user", "content": prompt},
            {"role": "user", "content": GENERATE_PLAN_AND_QUERIES_PROMPT},
        ]
    )
    print(response)
    return response
